cocktail_profiles.Name: Bahama Mama
Directions: Combine crushed ice, orange juice, pineapple juice, regular rum, coconut-flavored rum, and grenadine in a blender. Blend until the drink's consistency is slushy.

cocktail_profiles.Name: The REAL Long Island Iced Tea
Directions: Gather all ingredients.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour vodka, rum, gin, tequila, triple sec, and sour mix over ice; cover and shake.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
Pour cocktail into a Collins or hurricane glass; top with splash of cola for color. Garnish with a lemon slice.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS

cocktail_profiles.Name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail
Directions: Combine vodka, lime juice, triple sec, and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker. Add ice, cover and shake until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake in a Glass
Directions: Gather all ingredients.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
Fill a glass with ice. Splash grenadine over ice.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
Pour in pineapple juice and cake-flavored vodka; stir.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
Garnish with maraschino cherry to serve.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS

cocktail_profiles.Name: Margarita Cocktail
Ingredients: 1 orange flavored liqueur (such as Cointreau®)fluid ounce
Directions: Sprinkle salt on a small plate. Lightly wet the rim of a cocktail glass or margarita glass with a damp paper towel. Dip the moistened rim in salt to coat. Set aside.

Combine tequila, orange-flavored brandy, and lime juice in a cocktail shaker. Add ice and shake until chilled. Strain into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass or a salt-rimmed, ice-filled margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Classic Old Fashioned
Directions: Pour simple syrup, water, and bitters into a whiskey glass; stir to combine. Add ice cubes and pour in bourbon. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Kombucha Mule
Ingredients: ½ freshly squeezed lime juicefluid ounce
4 ginger-flavored Kombucha (such as KeVita®Master Brew Ginger)ounces
Directions: Fill a copper mule mug with ice. Add lime juice and vodka; stir to combine. Top with ginger kombucha. Lightly stir again and garnish with lime slice.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter
Directions: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat. Blend in brown sugar and confectioners' sugar until smooth.
Remove from the heat. Add ice cream, cinnamon, and nutmeg and whisk until incorporated. Pour mixture into a plastic container, cover, and store in the freezer.

cocktail_profiles.Name: White Russian
Directions: Combine cream, coffee-flavored liqueur, and vodka in a glass. Pour over ice in a highball glass.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Blue Motorcycle
Directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Combine vodka, tequila, rum, gin, Blue Curacao, sour mix, and lemon-lime soda in the cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously to get a frothy head on the drink.
Pour the contents of the shaker, including ice, into a tall bar glass and garnish with slice of lemon.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Blueberry Tea Cocktail
Ingredients: 1 orange liqueur (such as Grand Marnier®)fluid ounce
4 orange pekoe tea, or more to tastefluid ounces
Directions: Combine amaretto and orange liqueurs in a brandy snifter or glass. Pour in hot tea.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Cape Cod
Directions: Place ice in a short tumbler or old fashioned glass; pour in vodka and cranberry juice. Squeeze lime wedge into drink, then add it to the glass. Serve.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Basil Gimlet
Directions: Place coupe glass in the freezer while you are preparing the cocktail.
Combine 6 basil leaves and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker and muddle until basil leaves are crushed. Add ice, lime juice, and gin. Cover and shake until chilled, 15 to 20 seconds.
Strain cocktail into coupe glass and garnish with remaining basil leaf.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Jamaican Rum Punch
Directions: Stir pineapple juice, orange juice, 151 proof rum, dark rum, coconut-flavored rum, lime juice, and grenadine syrup together in a punch bowl. Float orange slices, lime slices, and lemon slices in the punch.
Ladle the punch into ice filled glasses, or chill the punch in the refrigerator until ready to serve.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Budget Jungle Juice for a Crowd
Directions: Pour orange drink, pink lemonade, pineapple-orange juice blend, vodka, rum, and fruit punch into a large punch bowl or container; stir well.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Finnish Long Drink
Ingredients: ½ freshly squeezed lemon juicefluid ounce
Directions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add lemon juice, grapefruit juice, gin, and grapefruit soda; stir to combine.
Top with club soda, lightly stir again, and garnish with grapefruit slice.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Negroni Sbagliato
Directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add Campari, vermouth, and agave. Shake well.
Fill champagne glass 1/2 way with mixture and top it off with sparkling white wine or Prosecco. Stir and serve with an orange twist.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Classic Spanish Sangria
Ingredients: ½ white sugar, or to tastecup
Directions: Have orange, lemon, lime, rum, wine, and orange juice well chilled.
Slice orange, lemon, and lime into thin rounds; place in a large glass pitcher. Pour in rum and 1/2 cup sugar. Chill in the refrigerator until flavors blend, about 2 hours.
Crush fruit lightly with a wooden spoon; stir in wine and orange juice. Adjust sweetness as desired.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Ginger-Hibiscus Sparkler
Ingredients: ½ ginger liqueur (such as Domaine de Canton®)cup
fresh ginger, peeled and thinly sliced
Directions: Steep hibiscus flowers in boiling water for 5 minutes; strain into a heatproof bowl set in a bowl of ice to speed cooling. Cool completely.

Transfer to a small pitcher. Stir in lime juice and ginger liqueur. Pour into ice-filled Collins glasses (about 5 oz. per glass) and top each with 1 oz. ginger beer. Garnish with mint sprigs and ginger slices.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
Directions: Fill a blender with ice cubes; pulse until ice is crushed.
Pour in tequila and triple sec, then add strawberries and limeade concentrate. Blend until smooth, about 30 seconds.
Pour into four margarita glasses and serve immediately.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Sangria! Sangria!
Directions: Mix together red wine, brandy, triple sec, lemonade concentrate, orange juice, lemon juice, and sugar in a bowl. Add orange, lemon, and lime slices and maraschino cherries.
Serve immediately over ice, or refrigerate 8 hours to overnight for best flavor.
For a fizzy sangria, add club soda just before serving.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Moscow Mule Cocktail
Directions: Pour vodka and lime juice into a mug; add ice cubes and ginger beer. Stir to combine.
Drop a lime wedge into the mug for garnish.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Best Strawberry Daiquiri
Directions: Place frozen strawberries in a blender; add sugar, lemon juice, and lime juice. Pour in rum and lemon-lime beverage, then add ice. Blend until smooth.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Grateful Dead Cocktail
Directions: Combine tequila, vodka, rum, gin, and raspberry liqueur in a highball glass. Fill with ice and top with sour mix.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Mimosa
Directions: Divide orange juice evenly into two flute glasses; top with chilled Champagne and serve.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Electric Lemonade
Ingredients: 1 lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage(12 fluid ounce) can or bottle
1 lemon - cut into wedges, for garnish
Directions: Fill a Collins glass with ice. Pour sour mix, vodka, and blue curacao over ice.
Fill to the top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with lemon wedge; serve with a straw.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Classic Bloody Mary
Ingredients: ¾ spicy tomato-vegetable juice cocktail (such as V8®)cup
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 garlic-stuffed green olives, threaded onto a toothpick
Directions: Pour salt onto a small plate. Moisten the rim of a glass and press into the salt. Fill the glass with ice cubes.

Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes; add vegetable juice cocktail, vodka, Worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, salt, and pepper. Cover and shake until the outside of shaker has frosted, about 20 seconds.
Strain Bloody Mary into the prepared glass and garnish with celery stalk and olives.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Vodka Paralyzer
Directions: Fill a highball glass with ice.
In the order listed, pour in cola, coffee liqueur, vodka, then milk. Stir briefly and top with a maraschino cherry.

cocktail_profiles.Name: The Real Mojito
Ingredients: ½ lime, cut into 3 wedges, dividedmedium
½ club soda, or as neededcup
Directions: Place mint leaves and 1 lime wedge into a sturdy glass. Use a muddler and crush to release mint oils and lime juice.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
Add remaining lime wedges and 2 tablespoons sugar, and muddle again to release the lime juice. Do not strain the mixture.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
Fill the glass almost to the top with ice. Pour in rum and fill the glass with club soda.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
Stir, taste, and add more sugar if desired.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Big Batch Freezer Dirty Martini
Directions: Pour 6 ounces of vodka from the bottle and set aside for another use.
To the reserved vodka in the bottle, add vermouth, brine, and water. Put the top on the bottle and invert bottle to incorporate the ingredients.
Place bottle in the freezer for at least 4 hours and up to 2 months.
To serve, pour desired amount into chilled glass and garnish with olives.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Gluehwein
Directions: Gather all ingredients.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
Combine water, sugar, and cinnamon stick in a saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS

Cut one orange in half; squeeze orange halves over the sugar mixture to release their juice. Push 5 cloves into the outside of each orange peel; place peels into the simmering mixture. Continue to simmer over the lowest heat until thick and syrupy, 20 to 30 minutes.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
While the mixture is simmering, slice remaining orange and set aside for serving.
When the mixture is finished simmering, stir in wine and heat until steaming but not simmering, 3 to 5 minutes. Discard orange peels and cinnamon stick.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
Ladle into mugs and garnish with orange slices.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS

cocktail_profiles.Name: The Perfect Margarita
Ingredients: 1 coarse sea salt, or as neededteaspoon
Directions: Moisten the rim of a glass with a lime wedge. Sprinkle salt onto a plate. Lightly dip the moistened rim into the salt. Place a large ice cube in the glass and freeze the prepared glass until ready to serve.
Fill a cocktail shaker with fresh ice. Add tequila, triple sec, and lime juice. Cover and shake vigorously until the outside of the shaker has frosted.
Strain margarita into the chilled glass and garnish with a slice of lime.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Orange Crush! Fresh Squeezed Orange and Vodka Cocktail
Directions: Fill a pint glass with ice cubes. Pour in orange-flavored vodka, triple sec, and orange juice, then top with lemon-lime soda. Mix well and garnish with orange slice.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Espresso Martini Cocktail
Ingredients: 1 ½ coffee-flavored liqueur (such as Kahlua®)fluid ounces
Directions: Pour vodka, coffee liqueur, crème de cacao, and espresso into a cocktail shaker; add ice, cover and shake until chilled.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Cape Codder Cocktail
Directions: Pour vodka and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice; stir well.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Kombucha Margarita
Ingredients: ¾ freshly squeezed lime juicefluid ounce
3 citrus flavored kombucha, or your favorite flavorounces
Directions: Fill a cocktail shaker half-full with ice. Add tequila, triple sec, and lime juice to the shaker. Seal and shake vigorously until outside is frosted, 10 to 15 seconds.
Sprinkle salt onto a plate. Moisten the rim of a glass with the lime wedge. Press the moistened rim into the salt. Fill glass with ice.
Strain margarita into the glass and top with kombucha. Stir gently and garnish with lime wedge, if desired.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Old-Fashioned Swedish Glögg
Directions: Heat port wine in a large stockpot with a lid over medium heat until just below the simmering point. Add bourbon and rum; heat until just below simmering. Save the bottles and their caps for storing leftover glögg.
Meanwhile, place cinnamon stick, orange peel, cloves, and cardamom pods in the center of the cheesecloth square. Gather edges of the cheesecloth and tie with kitchen twine to secure; set aside.

When wine mixture is very hot but not boiling, carefully light it with a long-handled match. Wearing a heatproof cooking mitt, carefully pour sugar into the flames; let mixture burn for 1 minute. Place the lid on the stockpot to extinguish the flames and turn off the heat. Let mixture cool, covered, about 10 minutes.
Add the cheesecloth spice bundle, raisins, and almonds to warm wine mixture; let it cool to room temperature, about 1 hour.
Strain cooled glögg and reserve the raisins and almonds.

To serve: Pour glögg into a saucepan and warm over medium-low heat until hot but not simmering, about 5 minutes. Ladle 3 ounces of warmed glögg into a small coffee cup or a small Swedish-style glögg mug, and garnish each serving with a few reserved raisins and almonds.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Pineapple Margarita
Ingredients: ¾ freshly squeezed lime juicefluid ounce
Directions: Fill a cocktail shaker half-full with ice. Add pineapple juice, tequila, triple sec, and lime juice to the shaker. Seal and shake vigorously until outside is frosted, 10 to 15 seconds.
Sprinkle salt onto a plate. Moisten the rim of a glass with a lime wedge. Press the moistened rim into the salt. Fill glass with ice.
Strain margarita into the glass and garnish with pineapple and lime wedge, if desired.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Dirty Martini
Directions: Gather all ingredients.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
Stir together vodka, dry vermouth, brine, and olives in a mixing glass. Pour into a glass or shaker with ice.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS
Serve on the rocks, or strain into chilled cocktail glasses.
DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS

cocktail_profiles.Name: Hot Toddy
Directions: Pour boiling water, whiskey, and honey into a mug. Add cloves, cinnamon, and lemon slice. Let mixture stand for 5 minutes so flavors can mingle, then sprinkle with a pinch of nutmeg before serving.

cocktail_profiles.Name: The Real Rum Runner
Ingredients: 1 grenadine syrup, or more to tastesplash
Directions: Combine 1 cup ice, pineapple juice, orange juice, blackberry liqueur, banana liqueur, light rum, dark rum, and grenadine in a cocktail shaker; shake to combine.
Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Pour in mixture. Add high-proof rum for a floater and garnish with orange slice.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Strawberry Mojito
Directions: Pour about 1/2 inch of sugar onto a small, shallow plate. Run a lime wedge around the rims of 8 cocktail glasses, then dip the rims into sugar to coat; set aside.

Squeeze all of the lime wedges into a sturdy glass pitcher. Toss juiced limes into the pitcher along with mint, strawberries, and 1 cup sugar. Crush with a muddler to release strawberry juice and mint oil. Stir in club soda and rum until sugar has dissolved.
Pour into the prepared glasses over ice cubes to serve.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Mai Tai
Ingredients: ½ coconut-flavored rum(1.5 fluid ounce) jigger
Directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add pineapple juice, orange juice, spiced rum, coconut rum, and grenadine. Shake vigorously and strain into a glass full of ice.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Washington Apple Cocktail
Ingredients: 1 sour apple schnapps (such as DeKuyper® Sour Apple Pucker)fluid ounce
Directions: Combine whiskey, cranberry juice, apple schnapps, and agave in a cocktail shaker. Fill cocktail shaker with ice and shake well.
Strain into frosted martini glasses and garnish with an apple slice.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Virgin Strawberry Daiquiri
Directions: Combine strawberries, sugar, lemon-lime soda, and lemon juice in the container of a blender. Add ice and blend until smooth.
Pour into a fancy glass to serve.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Blue Hawaiian Cocktail
Directions: Combine crushed ice, pineapple juice, rum, blue Curacao, and cream of coconut in a blender. Puree on high speed until smooth. Pour into a chilled highball glass.
Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a maraschino cherry.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Tom Collins Cocktail
Directions: Fill a Collins glass with 1 1/2 cups ice; set aside in the freezer.
Combine gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker. Add 1 cup ice, cover, and shake until chilled.
Strain into the chilled Collins glass. Top with club soda and garnish with lemon wedge.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Blood Orange Margarita
Ingredients: 2 ½ blood orange sparkling waterfluid ounces
Directions: Combine tequila, triple sec, sparkling water, blood orange juice, and lime juice in a cocktail shaker. Fill with ice .
Shake well and strain into chilled margarita glasses.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Vodka Martini Cocktail
Directions: Combine vodka and dry vermouth in a cocktail mixing glass. Fill with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with three olives on a toothpick.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Mojitos by the Pitcher
Directions: Muddle sugar and mint leaves together in a pitcher until leaves are well broken down. Add limes and muddle until limes are juiced. Pour rum into sugar mixture; add club soda and stir until sugar is dissolved.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Margaritas
Directions: Fill blender with crushed ice. Pour in limeade concentrate, tequila, and triple sec. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

cocktail_profiles.Name: White Russian Cocktail
Directions: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice. Pour in vodka and coffee liqueur. Top off with cream.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Pumpkin Spice Martini
Ingredients: 1 vanilla flavored vodka (such as Stoli®)(1.5 fluid ounce) jigger
1 Irish cream liqueur (such as Bailey's®)(1.5 fluid ounce) jigger
1 pumpkin flavored liqueur (such as Hiram Walker®)(1.5 fluid ounce) jigger
Directions: Fill a shaker with ice.
Pour vanilla-flavored vodka, Irish cream liqueur, and pumpkin-flavored liqueur over ice. Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted.
Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with ground cinnamon and ground nutmeg.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Party Punch IV
Ingredients: 1 frozen pineapple juice concentrate(16 ounce) can
1 frozen orange juice concentrate(12 fluid ounce) can
2 lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage, chilled(2 liter) bottles
Directions: In a punch bowl, combine pineapple juice concentrate, orange juice concentrate and vodka. Pour in lemon-lime soda. Float cherries and orange slices on top. Add ice before serving.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Hot Spiked Cider
Directions: Pour water into a large saucepan and bring to a boil.
Remove from heat and add orange spice tea bags. Cover and let steep for 5 minutes.
Remove tea bags and stir in apple cider, rum, brown sugar, and 2 cinnamon sticks. Heat cider over medium-low heat until just steaming.
Ladle hot cider into 6 mugs and drop 1/2 teaspoon butter into each. Garnish with a cinnamon "swizzle" stick.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Manhattan Cocktail
Directions: Combine whiskey, vermouth, and bitters in a cocktail mixing glass. Add ice and stir until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Classic Canadian Caesar
Ingredients: 1 hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to tastedash
8 tomato and clam juice cocktail (such as Clamato®)fluid ounces
Directions: Wet the rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge; set lime wedge aside for garnish.
Place celery salt in a small dish; press the rim of the glass into salt to coat. Add ice to the glass.
Pour vodka, Worcestershire sauce, and hot pepper sauce over ice; top with tomato-clam juice.
Garnish with lime wedge and celery stick. Serve with a straw.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Pitcher Perfect Margaritas
Directions: Combine ice, tequila, triple sec, fresh lime juice, and sweetened lime juice in a large pitcher; stir.
Pour kosher salt onto a plate. Rub the rim of a glass with lime wedge. Dip the rim of the glass into salt; fill the glass with margarita mixture; repeat for each serving.

cocktail_profiles.Name: Spiced Pear Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: ½ ginger liqueur (such as Domaine de Canton®)fluid ounce
Directions: Muddle chopped pear, 1 rosemary sprig, lemon twist, maple syrup, and bitters in a cocktail shaker with a muddler or the handle of a wooden spoon until pear is liquified. Add bourbon, ginger liqueur, and 1 cup ice to the cocktail shaker. Cover and shake until well chilled.

Place large ice cube into the rocks glass and set a small fine sieve over the glass. Strain the drink through the cocktail shaker top and the sieve to catch any large pieces of pulp or rosemary. Top with club soda. Garnish with pear wedge and rosemary sprig.
